# invalidAdvertisedAppId

**Type Property**

The App Store ID of the advertised app is invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invalidAdvertisedAppId: SKANError.Code { get }
```

## Discussion

Ad networks provide an advertised app identifier when signing an ad impression. If you’re providing a StoreKit-rendered ad, check that the value you set for [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKStoreProductParameterITunesItemIdentifier] in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKStoreProductViewController/loadProduct(withParameters:completionBlock:)] is a valid app identifer. If you’re providing a view-through ad, check the value of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKAdImpression/advertisedAppStoreItemIdentifier].

## Getting Error Codes

- **adNetworkIdMissing**: The ad network identifier in the ad impression doesn’t match the value in the information property list.
- **impressionMissingRequiredValue**: A required value is missing from a view-through ad impression.
- **impressionNotFound**: The system can’t find the ad impression.
- **impressionTooShort**
- **invalidCampaignId**: The campaign identifier that you provided is invalid.
- **invalidConversionValue**: The conversion value is invalid.
- **invalidSourceAppId**: The App Store ID of the app displaying the ad is invalid.
- **invalidVersion**: The SKAdNetwork version number is invalid.
- **mismatchedSourceAppId**: The source app identifier in the ad impression doesn’t match the app identifier in the source app.
- **unknown**: An unknown error occurred.
- **unsupported**: Your app attempted to use functionality that isn’t supported in the specified version.
- **SKANError.Code**: Constants that indicate the type of error for an ad network attribution operation.
